examples: The jazz combo played nightly at the little restaurant.
I need to open the safe but I forgot the combo.
I order the low priced combo platter: a taco, a burrito and a chimichanga.

entries.meaning: (video games) An action composed of a sequence of simpler actions, especially a composite attacking move in a fighting game.
Two or more gameplay elements (e.g. characters, items) which are powerful when used together.
(especially collectible card games) A strategy aiming to win by playing a specific combination of cards (or similar), often in a single turn.
(Australia, derogatory) A Caucasian man who marries or has a sexual relationship with an Aboriginal woman; a Caucasian man who lives among Aboriginal people and adopts Aboriginal culture
examples: " […]  Look at Ganger O'Cannon of Black Adder Creek, with his halfcaste wife and quadroon kids, a down-right family man—yet looked on as as much a combo as if he lived in a blacks' camp. Isn't that so?  […]  The casual comboes are respected, while men like O'Cannon and myself, who rear their kids, are utterly despised.  […] "

entries.meaning: (graphical user interface, informal) A combo box.
examples: Combos and lists are two very powerful controls that allow the user to select from a predetermined set of values.

verbs.description: combo (third-person singular simple present combos, present participle comboing, simple past and past participle comboed)
